Package javaslang.lang

Elementary Java extensions, like ensuring interface requirements at runtime, better print methods and stopping the JVM (even in the presence of deadlocks).

See: Description

Package javaslang.lang Description

Elementary Java extensions, like ensuring interface requirements at runtime, better print methods and stopping the JVM (even in the presence of deadlocks).
